snippet.title: Yora Adventures: Pen & Paper 2.0 - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Yora Adventures is the smart Tabletop RPG on your mobile device. Use integrated maps, clean adventure text sections, interactive character sheets and connected devices to experience your next game session in a new way - for players and game masters! Why don't you let your mobile phone do all the tiresome work and focus on what pen and paper gaming is about: immersive adventures through rich interactions!

Yora Adventures official website:   https://yora-adventures.com/
Join our official Discord server: https://discord.gg/CPwEjnA
Like Yora Adventures on Facebook:   https://www.facebook.com/YoraAdventures/
Follow Yora Adventures on Twitter:   https://twitter.com/yoraadventures
Follow Yora Adventures on Instagram:   https://www.instagram.com/yora_adventures
Join the journey:   https://yora-adventures.com/#contact

Directed & edited by Shawn Bu
Written by Shawn Bu & Denise Likomeno 
Executive Producer: Thomas Söpper 
Music & Sound by Vincent Lee 
Visual Effects by Marius Angeschrien 
Produced by Raw Mind Pictures GmbH

Starring: 
Alina Reicherts, Jonah Rausch, Salim Karas, Berna Kilicli & Jonathan Gyles

The time has come to summon the adventurer in you. Learn how to play Tabletop RPG the easiest way: Are you ready for your journey? It's just a click away!
